content.prompt:
Listen to the excerpt.

 

Which of the following statements best describes the division of the beat that is heard?

choices.label: The beat is divided into two parts throughout
The beat is divided into three parts throughout
The beat is divided into two parts and then into three parts
The beat is divided into three parts and then into two parts

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in performed music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
